storyInfo: Some five hundred kilometers away from Londinium, the Nachzehrer King pays the Rhodes Island landship a surprise visit and shares a conversation with Kal'tsit. In the Londinium palace, a Confessarius discovers an infiltrator, Ascalon.

attributes.content: 10:20 A.M. \ Overcast
527km out from Londinium, operation platform of an abandoned mine
Docking complete.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nothing out of the ordinary... Phew. Maybe you should take a break now?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Or are you going to start...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dame Kal'tsit, it's been a while...
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: T-Th-This rotten smell...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: A Vampire. In a doctor's gown too... How strange.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: *Hiss*...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Retract your fangs.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Not even the oldest red eyes dare to approach my flesh. They are cowards all, and fear my seething anger could cause their fangs to rot.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, how many Sarkaz are there who could cause me to lose my composure, even for a moment?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There's at least one, right in front of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I last saw an old Sarkaz hero walking Terra. I presume there must be a reason that you are gracing these barrenlands with your presence, King of the Nachzehrer?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You could say I'm here to visit an old friend.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: We've met twice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You looked very different the first time.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: As for the second time...
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: I saw someone outside the ship on the day of her accident... So that was really you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I thought the Nachzehrer Court had already made its choice when it turned a blind eye to an assassination that despicable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be it then or now, the nachzehrer have only ever had one choice. We are Sarkaz, and we are loyal to the Sarkaz, not the throne or the crown, much less ancient witchcraft.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: For the past few centuries, I have feasted on the flesh and blood of countless enemies, and I have witnessed the fall of several Sarkaz heroes.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Some of them died by the blades of their strongest foes, while others were assassinated.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: As such, I am here because I seek an answer.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Tell me—
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: What killed the last pure-blooded Wendigo?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Answer me, Dame!
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Kal'tsit! H-Hu-Hurry up and get Mon3tr out! He's going to strike!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The landship is right there! We can't just...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hear me, Nachzehrer King.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will not fight you here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee has departed the cage that had confined him for his entire life. I will not tarnish his last wish with pointless violence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is this your way of commemorating a Sarkaz hero? By running away... so loathsomely?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: I am not running away.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I gave you the answer you wanted, just like when the Wendigo wanted a fight in place of answers.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will say it again, Nachzehrer King. I refuse to fight you here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You feed on the flesh of your enemies and swallow their cries and regrets to fuel your next battle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yet we are not enemies. There were times when we fought alongside each other, and there were also times when we had to raise swords against each other over differing opinions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Likewise, this applies to Rhodes Island and Buldrokkas'tee when he sided with Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just as you witnessed her passing, I witnessed the return of a Wendigo soul to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You say you are his witness.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And he chose you himself?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: In his final moments... Buldrokkas'tee wanted a fitting opponent, and a friend to talk to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hah... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Very well. I accept your answer.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Now, you show yourself, Confessarius.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Had I moved to strike... even if the black monster did not come out, you would have raised your blade against me.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Even I would have to dodge the blade of a Confessarius... That is, if you CAN unsheathe your blade.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: You know...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I've known your kind for centuries.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: On the contrary, I am surprised that you joined the side of that outblood successor.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Can you carry the burden of your disobedience?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: It doesn't matter whether I can or cannot. Since the moment I was born, I have carried these sins.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Exactly! You fascinate me more than the masked one in Londinium!
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: And the Great Banshee, the young one. Is he not here?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: He is young in years, but his mother taught him well. If he were here, your odds would be a fair bit higher.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Your anger has quelled, Nachzehrer King.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That does not mean I do not wish to kill you.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Let me ask you. Is this ship built atop the remnants of a colossal artifact still the field base of the Sarkaz King-in-exile?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: We never once called ourselves that... not even when she was still alive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You still won't admit it, even though the outblood successor has now led her forces to Londinium?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Amiya knows her role.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We don't want a war to break out before our eyes. There should be no more needless sacrifices... Both Victorians and Sarkaz have shed more than enough blood already.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Poppycock! A hapless child who dares not call herself King presumes to save the Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: I would never presume to persuade the king of a Sarkaz court.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At least you know your place, then. It takes far more than your debate skills to win the approval of the courts.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: The outblood successor will face a challenge in that iron fortress unlike any before.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Is that why you allowed Amiya into Londinium?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The nachzehrer take their nutrients from war. Failure brings nothing but unproductive decay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems you still have your doubts about whether the Military Commission's resolution will truly bring victory to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nonsense!
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: (Alerted growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Not now, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nachzehrer King, I'm not doubting the leadership of the Sarkaz army. Just as you said, I'm here to talk to you as an old friend.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thanks to the Victorian dukes, Londinium is now an impenetrable fortress, yet Theresis is still able to summon the kings to the city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This tells us that you and your army are guarding the passages into Londinium, yet you did not stop our infiltration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You had the opportunity to kill me and destroy Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But you didn't.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And that's because of... Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh...
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: How would I know whether it is rebirth or destruction she will wreak unless I get to see her wear that black crown with my own eyes?
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: You will.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She will surpass what you... no, what any of us could ever imagine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's put an end to our friendly conversation.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: An eternally young dame, a free-willed vampire, and... a Confessarius who left her kind.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: We shall meet again in Londinium.
attributes.name: Peculiar-looking Elder

attributes.content: Phew... He's gone, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Truth be told, that really got my blood pumping. I've lived for a few centuries now, but there are still a lot of things I haven't finished.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: In his eyes... the real battlefield lies elsewhere.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: That's the only reason he let Rhodes Island be.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And I was just saying I don't want to go back to Kazdel... Even if I don't go looking for trouble, trouble's knocking on my door!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, we can't let something like this happen again. Otherwise, I'm not sure I can guarantee Rhodes Island's safety. We could be in trouble the second you two leave the ship.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It's time for us to depart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Shining, what's your decision?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor... Liz and I are ready. We can leave at a moment's notice.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I noticed that you did not deny the Nachzehrer King's accusations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is no point... in denying it.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: For the past three years, life aboard Rhodes Island has been peaceful. Neither Liz nor I could have asked for more.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Is it time to say our goodbyes, then?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, you know very well that if we continue our journey together, both you and Amiya will be in much more danger.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: However... if Rhodes Island needs us, we will remain.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Sir, Defensive Cannon S-309 has been activated—
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Looks like Manfred has made some progress.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Should we report this to the Regent?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: No need. All of this is according to His Majesty's plans.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Manfred still needs more concrete achievements if he is trying to earn the Court's trust. Capturing some fighters is far from enough.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Activating the secondary cannons is the first step. Tell him that His Majesty needs not one, or even several unimportant plates.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Should it be necessary, we can abandon even an entire district...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Stay still.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The enemy? Here?!
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Stay still, if you want to keep your head.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: What an unexpected guest.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You don't seem very surprised.
Hmm... Let me put it another way. We've been waiting for your arrival.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The ship is stopped somewhere in the barrenlands outside Londinium, and I thought you would only have just made it to the walls.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Nonetheless, this is hardly surprising. Assassins are always on the move, no?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You talk too much.
I have you to thank for giving me the opportunity, then.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: If you want to kill me, why not just do it? Your control of the shadow is so masterful that not even I could notice you immediately. And your breathing...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It seems you did not neglect the techniques you learned from His Majesty after leaving his side. He will be happy to know that.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Shut up.
Letting your emotions get the better of you is unbecoming of an assassin.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: How nimble.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You're tougher than the others. Sure enough.
Is that why you didn't strike first?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The life of a Confessarius is not worth taking if it means trading your own... I see. You have yet to see His Majesty, since you've entered the city.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: The shadow shows no sign of change. It does not move, much less answer.
The Confessarius gazes past the swath of emptiness to the window and beyond. There is nothing but another swath of emptiness there.
A golden ray of light flutters from his motionless hand toward the faint sunlight outside the window.
When you reach the throne... you might meet much more than just His Majesty.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: I look forward to seeing the look on your face, Ascalon.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: So they have arrived.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Yes, Your Majesty. Our leader has already met one of them in the legislature.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Inform Manfred. We must find out who is among them.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The young general should have already met with our Messenger, but...
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: He can handle this matter.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: We understand your trust in Manfred, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: But I must emphasize that he is busy dealing with the rebels on all sides. Judging by the results, it seems he did not immediately detect Rhodes Island's approach.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Tell me the candidates.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The kings have shown keen interest in that fake for some time now. Aside from the two who have already begun their moves, the Sanguinarch has also grown tired of superfluous social engagements with the city's nobles.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: He is happy to head to Sudean, to Manfred's aid.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Remind him.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: That should he ever find the 'The Sarkaz King' and {@nickname}, bring them to me at once.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: What of the Dame? Of course, the Nachzehrer King will keep an eye on her, but we must be prepared too.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Let the vampires deal with her as they see fit.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Very well, Your Majesty. I'm sure the Prince of Blood will be elated.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: On another note, our leader would like to know if you would have us arrange more guards to secure your surroundings?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: No need. If anyone wishes to call on me, let them come.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: There is one more thing... Suppose 'she' wants to meet with that group, should we interfere?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Let her go.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: In that case, what if 'she' meets her old friends from Rhodes Island...? Will that be a risk?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You'll remind me now that the witchcraft of the Confessarii is unreliable?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: My apologies. Please do not be angered.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Just as you saw, 'her' ideas and actions represent the Sarkaz will. This will... should be more than capable of defeating any lingering emotions from the past.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Yet the Confessarii exist to extinguish any lurking problems. Our leader must consider all possibilities.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: A puppet locked inside a cage cannot lead the Sarkaz on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Tell the Confessarii that I will say this only once.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Do not ever insult Theresa again with these excuses... and do not ever insult me again.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: We should be nearly there.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Got a signal...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What does it mean... Huh? An emergency meeting?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Was there some kind of emergency?! Rockrock, we have to get back!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What about them?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The commander's order is to bring them to this position, but she wouldn't have time to see them now.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Leave them here.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That's a bit of a waste of time, isn't it? How about this? I will bring them to the commander...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We still can't be sure these outsiders are the ones we're looking for.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Who else could they be?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's for the commander and the captains to decide.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You've already taken a big risk by bringing them into the tunnel without permission and leading them this far.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I've already tested them...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're quite smart, I'll admit, but you trust others too easily.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Take a closer look at your new friends. Especially the one who's also into drones.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Huh? Who? Me?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: She's... a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Rockrock
Closure
attributes.content: Yeah, I'm a Sarkaz, what's the matter? Well, I am not the only Sarkaz here, there...

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: Hmm, huh? A-Amiya?
Right, Miss Rockrock. They are Sarkaz, and they are also our trusted friends.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are not like the Sarkaz who took over your home up there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether they're the same is not for you to decide.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What's that supposed to mean?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You should've told us sooner you weren't keen on working with us. We wouldn't have squirmed around in these dark tunnels for so long!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You're locals. If you want to stay, I will welcome you like I welcome all my brothers in arms.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...but I can't trust them so easily.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Ugh... It doesn't matter what you say.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We live together. We die together.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: We are all Rhodes Island Operators.;All of them are equally trustworthy.

attributes.content: It's just as the Doctor said...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Rockrock... We've already exchanged plenty of intelligence.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you still won't afford us the most basic trust, I don't think we should force ourselves to keep walking this tunnel together.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, on behalf of Rhodes Island, thank you for assisting us earlier.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We will leave you and find our own way out.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Erm, that's not what Rockrock meant.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know. I can see where Miss Rockrock is coming from and how she feels. Resentment always has a root cause, and I definitely won't blame her for this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has faced similar problems, both before and now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether the suspicion and distrust arose because we are Infected or because we stand with the Sarkaz, it's all one and the same to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We will prove Rhodes Island's position with our actions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I hope you can also understand that we can't stand side by side next to someone who looks at us with such a disdainful gaze.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well said, Cautus. You're a fine leader, but that's not going to change my position. I am responsible for my brothers and sisters in arms too.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Feist... Captain Feist. I'll get going now. Send the word out and have everyone get ready. If you've really thought it through, take these people to the commander.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: She will make the final decision, and whatever her orders are, I will follow them.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Amiya, did I say something wrong? Our relationship didn't break down because of me, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, Closure. Whether or not we are friends is for Mr. Feist to decide.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Come, my Rhodes Island friends. I sure hope my judgment is correct... Otherwise, my lieutenant definitely won't forgive me, and I won't be able to show my face in front of our commander again.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Very well, Mr. Feist. We'll follow you. It's a good thing that I want to meet your commander too.
attributes.name: Amiya
